QuestData.Title: A New Home
QuestData.Description: Can we build it? Yes we can! Just west of the dig site I planted a banner on the shore. The sand is firm and it's as good a site as any. Take my tools and the parts you collected and build these ornery pests a different place to live.
QuestData.LogDescription: Build a murloc hovel at a site Groff marked with a flag on the nearby shore.
QuestData.CompletionText: How goes our new seaside condo?
QuestData.RewardText: Har har, that sounds like quite a heap you built there. Did they take to it? Good, good! Let's see if my plan comes to fruition.$B$B<Archaeologist Groff watches as scores of murlocs stream down the beach, pouring into the hovel from all corners of the compass. Gradually his brows knit together.>$B$BWhat have I done?
